title: fix: add audio models to API key permissions UI
author: ElliotEtag

gist.headline: Keys to the studio
gist.blurb: Audio models have joined the party in your API key settings. You can now grant (or revoke) permission to make some noise.
gist.summary: Added audio models (ElevenLabs, Whisper) to the API key permissions selector in the dashboard.
gist.impact: Users can now restrict API keys specifically to audio models, offering better control over usage and security.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee acting as a studio engineer or gatekeeper. The key visual metaphor is a 'musical key' - a physical key that unlocks sound.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the pollinations.ai bee holding a large golden pixel key that is emitting colorful musical notes. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient background. The bee is standing next to a retro control panel with audio sliders. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic but beautiful.

image.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the pollinations.ai bee organizing golden API keys on a wooden desk, attaching small musical note tags to specific keys. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting. Represents audio model permissions. Lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic but beautiful.
